development/documentation-pipeline.title: Documentation Pipeline
development/documentation-pipeline.description: This document describes the process for building, maintaining, and deploying the Codomyrmex project documentation website, which is powered by Docusaurus.

development/DocumentationMaintenance.title: Documentation Maintenance Guide
development/DocumentationMaintenance.description: This guide explains the Codomyrmex documentation maintenance system designed to prevent errors from accumulating across versions.

development/environment-setup.title: Environment Setup
development/environment-setup.description: This document outlines the steps to set up the development environment for the Codomyrmex project.

development/testing-strategy.title: Project Testing Strategy
development/testing-strategy.description: This document outlines the comprehensive testing strategy for the Codomyrmex project, ensuring software quality, reliability, and maintainability across all modules.

index.title: Welcome to Codomyrmex Documentation
index.description: Codomyrmex is a modular, extensible coding workspace designed to integrate open-source tools for building, documenting, analyzing, executing, and visualizing code.

intro.title: Welcome to Codomyrmex
intro.description: Codomyrmex is a modular and extensible coding workspace designed to enhance developer productivity through intelligent tools and seamless integration of AI capabilities.

modules/ai_code_editing/changelog.title: Changelog for Ai Code Editing
modules/ai_code_editing/changelog.description: All notable changes to this module will be documented in this file.

modules/ai_code_editing/docs/index.title: Ai Code Editing - Documentation
modules/ai_code_editing/docs/index.description: Welcome to the detailed documentation for the Ai Code Editing module.

modules/ai_code_editing/docs/technical_o.title: Ai Code Editing - Technical Overview
modules/ai_code_editing/docs/technical_o.description: This document provides a detailed technical overview of the Ai Code Editing module.

modules/ai_code_editing/docs/tutorials/g.title: Ai Code Editing - Tutorial: Generating a Python Function with generate_code_snippet
modules/ai_code_editing/docs/tutorials/g.description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of using the generatecodesnippet tool of the Ai Code Editing module.

modules/ai_code_editing/docs/tutorials/r.title: Ai Code Editing - Tutorial: Refactoring Python Code with refactor_code_snippet
modules/ai_code_editing/docs/tutorials/r.description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of using the refactorcodesnippet tool of the Ai Code Editing module to improve existing Python code.

modules/ai_code_editing/mcp_tool_specifi.title: AI Code Editing - MCP Tool Specification
modules/ai_code_editing/mcp_tool_specifi.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the AI Code Editing module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP). These tools leverage Large Language Models (LLMs) to perform code generation and modification tasks.

modules/ai_code_editing/security.title: Security Policy for Ai Code Editing
modules/ai_code_editing/security.description: This document outlines security procedures and policies for the Ai Code Editing module.

modules/ai_code_editing/usage_examples.title: AI Code Editing - Usage Examples
modules/ai_code_editing/usage_examples.description: This document provides examples of how to use the AI Code Editing module within the Codomyrmex project.

modules/build_synthesis/changelog.title: Changelog for Build Synthesis
modules/build_synthesis/changelog.description: All notable changes to this module will be documented in this file.

modules/build_synthesis/docs/index.title: Build Synthesis - Documentation
modules/build_synthesis/docs/index.description: Welcome to the detailed documentation for the Build Synthesis module.

modules/build_synthesis/docs/technical_o.title: Build Synthesis - Technical Overview
modules/build_synthesis/docs/technical_o.description: This document provides a detailed technical overview of the Build Synthesis module.

modules/build_synthesis/docs/tutorials/s.title: Build Synthesis - Tutorial: Synthesizing a New Codomyrmex Module with synthesize_component_from_spec
modules/build_synthesis/docs/tutorials/s.description: This tutorial guides you through using the synthesizecomponentfrom_spec MCP tool from the Build Synthesis module to scaffold a new, standard Codomyrmex module structure using a specification and template.

modules/build_synthesis/docs/tutorials/t.title: Build Synthesis - Tutorial: Triggering a Python Module Build with trigger_build
modules/build_synthesis/docs/tutorials/t.description: This tutorial will guide you through using the trigger_build MCP tool from the Build Synthesis module to build a Python package (wheel) for a hypothetical Codomyrmex utility module.

modules/build_synthesis/mcp_tool_specifi.title: Build Synthesis - MCP Tool Specification
modules/build_synthesis/mcp_tool_specifi.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the Build Synthesis module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

modules/build_synthesis/security.title: Security Policy for Build Synthesis
modules/build_synthesis/security.description: This document outlines security procedures and policies for the Build Synthesis module.

modules/build_synthesis/usage_examples.title: Build Synthesis - Usage Examples
modules/build_synthesis/usage_examples.description: Example 1: Basic Usage - Triggering a Build via MCP

modules/code_execution_sandbox/changelog.title: Changelog for Code Execution Sandbox
modules/code_execution_sandbox/changelog.description: All notable changes to this module will be documented in this file.

modules/code_execution_sandbox/docs/inde.title: Code Execution Sandbox - Documentation
modules/code_execution_sandbox/docs/inde.description: Welcome to the detailed documentation for the Code Execution Sandbox module.

modules/code_execution_sandbox/docs/tech.title: Code Execution Sandbox - Technical Overview
modules/code_execution_sandbox/docs/tech.description: This document provides a detailed technical overview of the Code Execution Sandbox module. Its primary role is the secure execution of untrusted code, making its architecture and design choices critical for the overall security of the Codomyrmex project.

modules/code_execution_sandbox/docs/tuto.title: Code Execution Sandbox - Tutorial: Using execute_code
modules/code_execution_sandbox/docs/tuto.description: This tutorial will guide you through using the execute_code MCP tool from the Code Execution Sandbox module to run code snippets in different languages, handle inputs/outputs, and understand resource limits and error reporting.

modules/code_execution_sandbox/mcp_tool_.title: Code Execution Sandbox - MCP Tool Specification
modules/code_execution_sandbox/mcp_tool_.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the Code Execution Sandbox module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

modules/code_execution_sandbox/security.title: Security Policy for Code Execution Sandbox
modules/code_execution_sandbox/security.description: This document outlines security procedures, policies, and critical considerations for the Code Execution Sandbox module. This module is highly security-sensitive. Its primary purpose is to execute untrusted code, and therefore, its design, implementation, configuration, and usage must prioritize security above all else.

modules/code_execution_sandbox/usage_exa.title: Code Execution Sandbox - Usage Examples
modules/code_execution_sandbox/usage_exa.description: This document provides examples of how to use the Code Execution Sandbox module within the Codomyrmex project.

modules/data_visualization/changelog.title: Changelog for Data Visualization
modules/data_visualization/changelog.description: All notable changes to this module will be documented in this file.

modules/data_visualization/docs/index.title: Data Visualization - Documentation
modules/data_visualization/docs/index.description: Welcome to the detailed documentation for the Data Visualization module.

modules/data_visualization/docs/technica.title: Data Visualization - Technical Overview
modules/data_visualization/docs/technica.description: This document provides a detailed technical overview of the Data Visualization module.

modules/data_visualization/docs/tutorial.title: Data Visualization - Tutorial: Generating a Bar Chart
modules/data_visualization/docs/tutorial.description: This tutorial will guide you through generating both vertical and horizontal bar charts using the Data Visualization module's direct Python functions. We'll cover plotting categorical data, basic customizations, and saving the output.

modules/data_visualization/docs/tutorial.title: Data Visualization - Tutorial: Generating a Histogram
modules/data_visualization/docs/tutorial.description: This tutorial will guide you through generating a histogram to visualize the distribution of a dataset, using the Data Visualization module's direct Python functions. We'll cover basic customizations and saving the output.

modules/data_visualization/docs/tutorial.title: Data Visualization - Tutorial: Generating a Line Plot
modules/data_visualization/docs/tutorial.description: This tutorial will guide you through generating a line plot using the Data Visualization module's direct Python functions. We'll cover plotting single and multiple lines, basic customizations, and saving the output.

modules/data_visualization/docs/tutorial.title: Data Visualization - Tutorial: Generating a Pie Chart
modules/data_visualization/docs/tutorial.description: This tutorial will guide you through generating a pie chart to visualize proportions of a whole, using the Data Visualization module's direct Python functions. We'll cover basic customizations like exploding slices, adding percentages, and saving the output.

modules/data_visualization/docs/tutorial.title: Data Visualization - Tutorial: Generating a Scatter Plot
modules/data_visualization/docs/tutorial.description: This tutorial will guide you through generating a scatter plot using the Data Visualization module's direct Python functions. We'll cover plotting data points, basic customizations, and saving the output.

modules/data_visualization/docs/tutorial.title: Data Visualization - Tutorial: Generating a Heatmap via MCP
modules/data_visualization/docs/tutorial.description: This tutorial will guide you through generating a heatmap using the Data Visualization module's create_heatmap Model Context Protocol (MCP) tool.

modules/data_visualization/mcp_tool_spec.title: Data Visualization - MCP Tool Specification
modules/data_visualization/mcp_tool_spec.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the Data Visualization module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

modules/data_visualization/security.title: Security Policy for Data Visualization
modules/data_visualization/security.description: This document outlines security procedures, policies, and critical considerations for the Data Visualization module. While primarily focused on generating image files from provided data, several aspects require careful security attention, especially concerning input data handling, output path management, and resource consumption.

modules/data_visualization/usage_example.title: Data Visualization - Usage Examples
modules/data_visualization/usage_example.description: This document provides usage examples for the Data Visualization module. All plotting functions use the Codomyrmex logging system (loggingmonitoring) for logging. It is recommended to call setuplogging() and ensuredependenciesinstalled() at application startup.

modules/documentation/changelog.title: Documentation Module - Changelog
modules/documentation/changelog.description: All notable changes to this module (the documentation hub itself) will be documented in this file.

modules/documentation/docs/index.title: Documentation Module - Detailed Docs
modules/documentation/docs/index.description: Welcome to the detailed documentation specifically for the documentation module itself.

modules/documentation/docs/technical_ove.title: Documentation Module - Technical Overview
modules/documentation/docs/technical_ove.description: This document provides a detailed technical overview of the Documentation module itself, focusing on its role as the Docusaurus-based documentation hub.

modules/documentation/docs/tutorials/exa.title: Tutorial: Adding a New Module to Documentation
modules/documentation/docs/tutorials/exa.description: This tutorial guides you through the process of integrating documentation from a new or existing Codomyrmex module into the central Docusaurus-based documentation website.

modules/documentation/docs/tutorials/ind.title: Documentation Module - Tutorials
modules/documentation/docs/tutorials/ind.description: Welcome to the tutorials section for the documentation module.

modules/documentation/index.title: Documentation Module (Meta)
modules/documentation/index.description: This module is responsible for generating and serving the comprehensive documentation website for the Codomyrmex project.

modules/documentation/mcp_tool_specifica.title: Documentation Module - MCP Tool Specification
modules/documentation/mcp_tool_specifica.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the Documentation module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP). These tools primarily interact with the Docusaurus documentation website generation process.

modules/documentation/security.title: Documentation Module - Security Policy
modules/documentation/security.description: This document outlines security procedures and policies specifically for the documentation module, which manages the Docusaurus website for the Codomyrmex project.

modules/documentation/usage_examples.title: Documentation Module - Usage Examples
modules/documentation/usage_examples.description: This section provides usage examples related to the documentation module itself, such as managing the documentation build, local development, or specific Docusaurus features relevant to Codomyrmex.

modules/environment_setup/changelog.description: All notable changes to this module will be documented in this file.

modules/environment_setup/docs/index.description: Welcome to the detailed documentation for the Environment Setup module.

modules/environment_setup/docs/technical.title: Environment Setup - Technical Overview
modules/environment_setup/docs/technical.description: This document provides a detailed technical overview of the Environment Setup module.

modules/environment_setup/docs/tutorials.title: Environment Setup - Troubleshooting Common Setup Issues
modules/environment_setup/docs/tutorials.description: This document provides troubleshooting tips for common environment setup issues encountered while setting up the Codomyrmex project, along with some OS-specific considerations.

modules/environment_setup/index.title: Environment Setup Module
modules/environment_setup/index.description: This document outlines the steps to set up the development environment for the Codomyrmex project.

modules/environment_setup/mcp_tool_speci.title: Environment Setup - MCP Tool Specification
modules/environment_setup/mcp_tool_speci.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the Environment Setup module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

modules/environment_setup/README.title: Environment Setup Module (environment_setup)
modules/environment_setup/README.description: For general project development environment setup instructions (covering prerequisites, cloning, virtual environments, Python dependencies, API keys, Docusaurus, linters, and tests for the entire Codomyrmex project), please refer to the "Getting Started: Development Environment Setup" section in the main project README.md.

modules/environment_setup/security.title: Security Policy for Environment Setup
modules/environment_setup/security.description: This document outlines security procedures, policies, and key considerations for the Environment Setup module. The primary goal of this module is to facilitate a secure and consistent development environment for the Codomyrmex project.

modules/environment_setup/usage_examples.title: Environment Setup - Usage Examples
modules/environment_setup/usage_examples.description: This document provides usage examples for the environmentsetup module, primarily focusing on the envchecker.py script and its functions.

modules/git_operations/changelog.title: Changelog for Git Operations
modules/git_operations/changelog.description: All notable changes to this module will be documented in this file.

modules/git_operations/docs/index.description: Welcome to the detailed documentation for the Git Operations module.

modules/git_operations/docs/technical_ov.description: This document provides a detailed technical overview of the Git Operations module.

modules/git_operations/docs/tutorials/cr.title: Git Operations - Tutorial: Creating a Feature Branch
modules/git_operations/docs/tutorials/cr.description: This tutorial guides you through using a conceptual createfeaturebranch function from the Git Operations module to start new development work in a Codomyrmex project, adhering to typical project conventions.

modules/git_operations/mcp_tool_specific.title: Git Operations - MCP Tool Specification
modules/git_operations/mcp_tool_specific.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the Git Operations module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

modules/git_operations/security.title: Security Policy for Git Operations
modules/git_operations/security.description: This document outlines security procedures, policies, and critical considerations for the Git Operations module. This module provides tools to programmatically interact with Git repositories, which has inherent security implications.

modules/git_operations/usage_examples.title: Git Operations - Usage Examples
modules/git_operations/usage_examples.description: This document provides conceptual usage examples for the gitoperations module, assuming the future implementation of functions outlined in its APISPECIFICATION.md. These examples showcase how the Python API could be used to automate common Git tasks.

modules/logging_monitoring/changelog.description: All notable changes to this module will be documented in this file.

modules/logging_monitoring/docs/index.description: Welcome to the detailed documentation for the Logging Monitoring module.

modules/logging_monitoring/docs/technica.description: This document provides a detailed technical overview of the Logging Monitoring module.

modules/logging_monitoring/docs/tutorial.title: Logging Monitoring - Tutorial: Setting Up and Using Centralized Logging
modules/logging_monitoring/docs/tutorial.description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of setting up and using the centralized logging feature of the Logging Monitoring module in your Codomyrmex project.

modules/logging_monitoring/mcp_tool_spec.title: Logging & Monitoring - MCP Tool Specification
modules/logging_monitoring/mcp_tool_spec.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the Logging & Monitoring module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

modules/logging_monitoring/security.title: Security Policy for Logging & Monitoring
modules/logging_monitoring/security.description: This document outlines security procedures, policies, and critical considerations for the Logging & Monitoring module within the Codomyrmex project. The primary purpose of this module is to provide a consistent and configurable way to record application events, but logs themselves can become a source of security risk if not handled properly.

modules/logging_monitoring/usage_example.title: Logging Monitoring - Usage Examples
modules/logging_monitoring/usage_example.description: This document provides usage examples for the Logging Monitoring module.

modules/model_context_protocol/changelog.title: Changelog for Model Context Protocol
modules/model_context_protocol/changelog.description: All notable changes to this module will be documented in this file.

modules/model_context_protocol/docs/inde.title: Model Context Protocol - Documentation
modules/model_context_protocol/docs/inde.description: Welcome to the detailed documentation for the Model Context Protocol module.

modules/model_context_protocol/docs/tuto.title: Model Context Protocol - Example Tutorial: Getting Started with [Feature X]
modules/model_context_protocol/docs/tuto.description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of using [Feature X] of the Model Context Protocol module.

modules/model_context_protocol/docs/tuto.title: Tutorial: Implementing an MCP-Compliant Tool in Python
modules/model_context_protocol/docs/tuto.description: Goal: This tutorial guides you through the process of implementing a Python function that can be exposed as a Model Context Protocol (MCP) compliant tool. We will cover creating a basic tool specification, writing the Python function, and using the provided Pydantic models (MCPToolCall, MCPToolResult) to handle requests and responses. It includes code examples for a hypothetical string utility tool.

modules/model_context_protocol/mcp_tool_.title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) - Meta-Specification for Tool Definitions

modules/model_context_protocol/security.title: Security Policy for Model Context Protocol
modules/model_context_protocol/security.description: This document outlines security procedures and policies specifically relevant to the Model Context Protocol (MCP) and its implementation within the Codomyrmex ecosystem.

modules/model_context_protocol/usage_exa.title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) - Usage Examples
modules/model_context_protocol/usage_exa.description: This document provides practical examples related to the Model Context Protocol (MCP). It shows how other modules should structure their tool specifications and how AI agents might interact with these tools using MCP messages.

modules/module_template/changelog.title: Changelog for [Module Name]
modules/module_template/changelog.description: All notable changes to this module will be documented in this file.

modules/module_template/docs/index.title: [Module Name] - Documentation

modules/module_template/mcp_tool_specifi.title: [Module Name] - MCP Tool Specification Template
modules/module_template/mcp_tool_specifi.description: This document serves as a template for defining tools within the [Module Name] module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

modules/module_template/README.title: [Module Name] - Module Template README
modules/module_template/README.description: Note for Developers: This is a template README.md for new Codomyrmex modules. When creating a new module, copy this file (and the entire template/module_template/ directory structure) to your new module's root. Then, replace all bracketed placeholders (e.g., [Module Name], [Your specific component...]) and instructional text in parentheses (...) with information specific to your module.

modules/module_template/security.title: Security Policy for [Module Name]
modules/module_template/security.description: This document outlines security procedures and policies for the [Module Name] module.

modules/pattern_matching/mcp_tool_specif.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the Pattern Matching module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP). These tools leverage the cased/kit toolkit for various code analysis and search functionalities.

modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.title: Pattern Matching - Changelog
modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.description: All notable changes to the Pattern Matching module will be documented in this file.

modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.title: Pattern Matching Module
modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.description: The Pattern Matching module enables exhaustive, type-safe pattern matching across the Codomyrmex ecosystem. It provides tools for code analysis, dependency tracking, and semantic pattern recognition.

modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.title: Pattern Matching - MCP Tool Specification
modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.description: This document outlines the specification for tools within the Pattern Matching module that are intended to be integrated with the Model Context Protocol (MCP). These tools leverage the cased/kit toolkit for various code analysis and search functionalities.

modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.title: Pattern Matching - Documentation Tasks
modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.description: This document tracks the remaining documentation tasks for the Pattern Matching module. It is for internal use and should be removed once all tasks are complete.

modules/pattern_matching/pattern-matchin.description: This document provides practical examples of using the Pattern Matching module.

modules/pattern_matching/security.description: This document outlines security procedures and policies for the Pattern Matching module.

modules/static_analysis/security.description: This document outlines security procedures and policies for the Static Analysis module.

project/architecture.title: Codomyrmex Project Architecture
project/architecture.description: This document provides a high-level overview of the Codomyrmex project architecture. The project is designed to be modular, allowing for independent development and functionality of its various components while ensuring they can interoperate effectively.

project/contributing.title: Contributing to Codomyrmex
project/contributing.description: Thank you for your interest in contributing to the Codomyrmex project! We appreciate the community's efforts to help us improve and grow this modular, extensible coding workspace.

project/CONTRIBUTING_TO_DOCUMENTATION.title: Contributing to Documentation
project/CONTRIBUTING_TO_DOCUMENTATION.description: Thank you for your interest in contributing to the Codomyrmex project documentation! High-quality documentation is crucial for making the project accessible, understandable, and easy to use for everyone.

project/ERROR_HANDLING_LOGGING.title: Project-Wide Error Handling and Logging Best Practices
project/ERROR_HANDLING_LOGGING.description: This document outlines the best practices for error handling and logging within the Codomyrmex project. Consistent and effective error management is crucial for maintainability, debugging, and operational stability.

project/TESTING_STRATEGY.title: Project-Wide Testing Strategy
project/TESTING_STRATEGY.description: This document outlines the comprehensive testing strategy for the Codomyrmex project, ensuring code quality, reliability, and maintainability across all modules.

technical_overview.title: Documentation - Technical Overview
technical_overview.description: This document provides a detailed technical overview of the Documentation module.

tutorials/example_tutorial.title: Documentation - Example Tutorial: Getting Started with [Feature X]
tutorials/example_tutorial.description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of using [Feature X] of the Documentation module.
